title: Ep 66: DeFi 2.0 Meets Tokenomics 2.0 | Economics Of Value Creation
description:
How do we effectively create value in DeFi? How does Vesper move towards long-term value creation?


00:00 Introduction & Highlights

01:10 Purpose Of A Market

01:15 Context Of Value

02:45 Value Cycle

03:52 Balancing The Value Cycle

06:04 Case Study: Vesper Finance

06:59 Vesper Model

12:54 More Resources & How to Support Us!
